title: Flames - New limited edition art print by Seb Lester
content:
Hello all,

I have a new limited edition art print out today.  
It's called 'Flames'. It's been beautifully screen printed  
and it's available in gold and silver editions.

All the details are available at my website, [www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113211/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk").

Thanks for reading and best wishes,

Seb Lester

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Flames_Silver_SL_5246.jpg)
author: Seb Lester
